Metadata.title: DouzePoints - Eurovision Scoreboard Simulator
Metadata.description: Experience the excitement of Eurovision with DouzePoints, the interactive scoreboard simulator. Vote for countries, watch points accumulate, and relive the magic of Eurovision Song Contest

error.title: Oops! Something Went Wrong
error.errorInfoReloadPage: First, try clicking "Reload Page" to reload the page keeping all local data.
error.errorInfoResetApplication: If the problem persists, click "Reset Application" to clear all local data and reload the app.
error.errorInfoNotAffected: Your saved profile data and cloud-synced information won't be affected.
error.errorInfoReport: The error is automatically reported to the developer. But you can still send an email to the developer with the additional error details (e.g., what you did to trigger the error) at

imageUpload.errorUnsupportedImageType: Unsupported image type. Allowed: PNG, JPEG, WEBP, SVG
imageUpload.errorImageTooLarge: Image is too large. Max size is {maxSize}MB. Please compress it or upload a smaller image.

error.pleaseSelectValidImageFile: Please select a valid image file.

eventStageModal.pleaseSelectAtLeastOneVotingCountry: Please select at least one voting country
eventStageModal.areYouSureYouWantToDelete: Are you sure you want to delete {name}?
eventStageModal.qualifierTargetsDescription: Choose how many entries from this stage advance to each later stage.
eventStageModal.noVotingCountriesSelected: No voting countries selected. Add countries from the list below.

validation.noVotingCountriesInStage: There are no voting countries in {stageName}.
validation.qualifiersAmountMustBeAtLeast1: The number of qualifiers in {stageName} must be at least 1.
validation.qualifiersAmountMustBeLessThanParticipan: The number of qualifiers in {stageName} must be less than the number of participants.
validation.participantsMustBeAtLeast: The number of participants in {stageName} must be at least {count} (depends on the number of items in the points system).
validation.totalQualifiersMustBeAtLeast: The total number of qualifiers for the Grand Final must be at least {count}.
validation.grandFinalParticipantsMustBeAtLeast: The number of the Grand Final participants must be at least {count}.
validation.qualifiersExceedParticipants: The number of qualifiers in {stageName} exceeds the number of participants.
validation.qualifiersCannotMoveToPrecedentStage: Qualifiers cannot move to a precedent stage ({stageName} -> {targetStageName}).

eventSetupModal.grandFinalOnlyConfirm: This will reset your setup and keep only the Grand Final. Are you sure you want to continue?
eventSetupModal.grandFinalOnlyConfirmNotGfOnly: This will reset your setup and restore all shows (Semi-Finals + Grand Final). Are you sure you want to continue?
eventSetupModal.youNeedToBeLoggedInToCreateAndUseCustomE: You need to be logged in to create and use custom entries.
eventSetupModal.contestIsInProgress: A contest is in progress. Changing the year will reset the current scoreboard and start a new setup. Are you sure?
eventSetupModal.enterThePointsEachVotingCountryAwardsToP: Enter the points each voting country awards to participants
eventSetupModal.importedEntriesDescription: Imported entries are custom entries that have been imported from other contests. They are not editable.

contests.title: Contests
contests.description: Create contests or select public contests
contests.overwriteContestSetupAndResultsTooltip: When enabled, updates the contest structure and simulation results using the current state. When disabled, only the basic info (name, year, hosting country, etc.) will be updated.
contests.noContestsFoundMatchingYourSearch: No contests found matching your search.
contests.noContestsYetCreateYourFirstContest: No contests yet. Create your first contest!

contests.pleaseSignInToSaveContests: Please sign in to save contests
contests.confirmResetContest: Are you sure you want to reset the contest to the last saved version? You will lose all your changes since the last save.

themes.areYouSureYouWantToRemoveThisThemeFromYo: Are you sure you want to remove this theme from your saved themes?
themes.noPublicThemesFoundMatchingYourSearch: No public themes found matching your search.

feedbackInfo.foundBug: Found a bug, have a feature idea, or just want to share feedback?
feedbackInfo.openIssueOnGitHub: Feel free to open an issue on
feedbackInfo.gitHubDiscussions: Alternatively, you can use GitHub Discussions to share suggestions, ask questions, or post your simulation results.
feedbackInfo.bugReportDetails: If you're reporting a bug, please include your:
feedbackInfo.bugReportDetailsItem4: and any helpful details like screenshots or videos
feedbackInfo.datesAreApproximate: The dates are approximate and may change
feedbackInfo.translationIssueDescription: If you noticed some translation issues, please let me know by sending an email to

general.resetAllSettingsConfirmation: Are you sure you want to reset all settings? This won't affect your presets.

odds.goBackToSetupAndSelectCountriesForEventT: Go back to the setup and select countries for the event to set their odds
odds.oddsTooltip:
Each country has separate jury and televote odds (0–100).

Higher number = better chance of getting more points.

Initial values are based on countries' real Eurovision results for the selected year.
odds.randomnessLevelTooltip:
The Randomness Level slider controls predictability:

Low = more realistic, following odds closely.

High = more chaotic, unpredictable.

voting.sparklesIconTooltip: The icon indicates that the points will be animated when the country receives them. Click to toggle.
voting.pickQualifiersWithoutAwardingPointsToolt:
Click countries (or choose randomly) to qualify them without awarding points.

The Semi-Finals voting mode still affects random qualifiers and points distribution.
voting.televoteRevealOrder: Televote reveal order: lowest to highest
voting.televoteRevealOrderTooltip: When enabled, the televote points will be announced from lowest to highest (ESC 2016–2018 system). Otherwise, order follows jury points.
voting.limitManualTelevotePointsTooltip: When enabled, limits the total televote points you can award (when manually entering points) and shows how many remain.
voting.groupRandomJuryVotingTooltip: When enabled, clicking 'Vote randomly' will award one set of jury points, grouped as either (1–8, 10) or (12).
voting.enablePredefinedVotingTooltip: When enabled, you can set each country's votes before the voting begins.
voting.enablePresentationModeTooltip: When enabled, displays the presentation panel, which allows you to run voting automatically, without requiring any clicks.
voting.autoStartPresentationTooltip: When enabled, the presentation will start automatically after the voting starts.

ui.dragAndDropToUpload: Drag and drop or click to upload
ui.warnBeforeManuallyAssigningTelevotePoint: Warn before manually assigning televote points
ui.imageSizeIsPrettyLarge: Image size is pretty large ({size}MB). This can slow down the simulation, so you might want to compress it or use a smaller image. Do you want to continue with this image?
